mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.`permission` FROM `sys_menu` as m LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` as rm ON rm.`menu_id` = m.`id` LEFT JOIN `sys_role` as r ON r.`id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_user_role` as sur ON sur.`role_id` = r.`id` LEFT JOIN `sys_user` as u ON u.`id` = sur.`user_id` WHERE u.`id` = #{userId} AND m.`type` IN (2, 3) AND m.`status` = 1 AND r.`status` = 1
